title: RTiVISS: real-time video interactive systems for sustainability.
abstract: RTiVISS is an exploratory project that proposes to investigate innovative concepts and design methods regarding environmental and sustainability issues. It is concerned with natural resources, specially forests, and their preservation, through critical research and experimental artistic approaches. The project proposes multiplatform access to real-time networked video and allows users to adopt selected forests under surveillance. The interactive system feeds a whole community that establishes connections by sharing "the emotion of real-time" and the challenge of uncertainty, while remotely monitoring natural environments for forests protection. This achievement enables artistic explorations with digital media in interactive installations that engage the audience senses in unconventional ways.
